translation.en: [Asha] My name is Asha Maurya.
And I have a joyous appetite for life.
I'm patient.
Resourceful.
And I’m a natural in the kitchen.
Motherly at heart, I yearn to have a family to feed.
translation.zh: ‎我内心充满母爱 我向往为家人做菜

translation.en: An economist by day,
I live a quiet, traditional life by night.
translation.zh: ‎入夜后 我过着平凡安静的生活

translation.en: My hobbies include fine dining
translation.zh: ‎我的爱好包括到高级餐厅用餐

translation.en: and relaxing at home.
A natural-born athlete,
with boundless energy.
I'm seeking my Indian Prince Charming…
translation.zh: ‎我在寻找我的印度白马王子

translation.en: …with a professional job and MBA.
translation.zh:
‎他必须是专业人士
‎拥有工商管理硕士学位

translation.en: At heart, I'm just a simple girl
translation.zh: ‎我内心里只是个平凡的女孩

translation.en: who loves weddings.
♪ Do it in the pictures Show me love ♪ ♪ And what's it gonna be ♪
And I dream of having a grand one of my own someday.
translation.zh: ‎我梦想将来办一场世纪婚礼

translation.en: Don't do it.
-[man] Look alive. Meeting's in 20. -Huh?
“Singapore equals economic miracle.”
translation.zh: ‎“新加坡是经济奇迹的代名词”

translation.en: Brilliant.
Please tell me you've slept.
Oh. Yeah, I slept. I slept for 56 minutes.
translation.zh: ‎我睡饱了 睡了整整56分钟

translation.en: Asha, stop killing yourself. This is what you've been waiting for.
translation.zh:
‎别再自我毁灭了
‎这是你期待已久的一刻

translation.en: It's all on you.
Now, get it together and prove to my boss in London
translation.zh: ‎振作起来 你要证明给我的上司看

translation.en: that I'm a genius for stealing you from Wall St.
translation.zh:
‎我当初把你从华尔街撬过来
‎是个聪明绝顶的决定

translation.en: Yes.
-[woman] They're early! -[tapping on glass]
They just entered the building. That's what you're wearing?
translation.zh: ‎他们刚踏进大楼 你打算这么穿吗？

translation.en: I had a family thing last night. Black or navy?
translation.zh:
‎我昨晚亲戚家办喜事
‎黑色还是海军蓝？

translation.en: -Black, definitely black. -Mm-hmm.
-Or maybe the navy? -Tina!
Some privacy, please?
Singapore is a place where economic miracles happen.
translation.zh: ‎新加坡是经济奇迹发生的地方

translation.en: And today, you have the opportunity to help spread that miracle.
translation.zh: ‎今天你们有机会把这个奇迹散播出去

translation.en: Your investment is key to establishing our Southeast Asia loan initiative.
translation.zh:
‎你们的资金
‎是我们开拓东南亚贷款市场的关键

translation.en: Which would launch Singapore as a powder…
translation.zh: ‎到时新加坡将成为一个强大的…

translation.en: …ful, powerful…
Powder…
Pow… Powerful--
Is something wrong here?
No, of course not.
Uh, definitely not. Definitely not.
The…
This is your chance to establish Singapore as a center--
translation.zh: ‎这是你们将新加坡设为策略中心…

translation.en: [Mrs. Tan] Okay, let's get to it.
Micro loans aren't a cure for poverty. It's one piece of a puzzle.
translation.zh:
‎微型贷款无法根治贫困问题
‎解决贫困只是其中一个难题

translation.en: Why Asia and why now? What's the strategy?
translation.zh:
‎为什么选择亚洲？
‎为什么是现在？你们有什么策略？

translation.en: Oh, well, we have 140 million borrowers, 80% women, 65% rural.
translation.zh:
‎我们公司有一亿四千万的借贷者
‎其中80%是女性 65%是小农

translation.en: Our annual growth is 12% with a projected portfolio yield of--
translation.zh:
‎我们公司年均增长率为12%
‎我们预计投资组合将带来…

translation.en: -Your numbers are impressive. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-你们公司的数据令人大开眼界
‎-谢谢

translation.en: But what's the heart of your story?
[whispers] Heart?
We believe that women
are key to social change by creating a more sustainable future--
translation.zh:
‎是社会改革的关键
‎通过创造更持久的未来…

translation.en: Ms. Maurya, we believe in your fund's potential to do good.
translation.zh:
‎莫亚小姐 我们相信你们公司
‎一定会将资金用来做好事

translation.en: But right now, we're just not seeing your vision.
translation.zh: ‎只是我们无法看见你的愿景

translation.en: [Asha] I mean, the vision is…
-It's clear in the next slide. -It's okay, Asha.
[Asha] If you could give me one more…
That went well.
I think.
I can't believe my mom sent a guy to work today of all days.
translation.zh: ‎我妈竟然叫一个男人到我办公室找我

translation.en: Don’t blame Mommy. We’ve all botched pitches like that.
translation.zh: ‎别怪妈妈 我们都搞砸了这场推介会

translation.en: Shake it off, move on.
I can see why you’re upset. This is all lies.
translation.zh:
‎我知道为什么你不高兴
‎上面对你的描述都是假的

translation.en: You're not a natural in the kitchen. You're certainly not a simple girl.
translation.zh: ‎你不是厨艺高手 也不是平凡的女孩

translation.en: Can you take that down?
I can't because she's changed the password.
Oh my God, this is a nightmare.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 这简直是一场噩梦

translation.en: I think he's got a kind of hot accountant vibe.
translation.zh: ‎他散发出一种会计师男神的气质

translation.en: Like he could do times tables in his head.
translation.zh: ‎仿佛可以把日程表记在脑海里似的

translation.en: -[sighs] -Are we still going out for coffee or…
Look, I'm sorry, um…
But this is my mother's fault. So…
Yeah. Mine too.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 这也是我妈搞出来的

translation.en: -Handle him. -Yep.
[woman] Sir.
Just…
This is for you. Call me.
Please tell me you can get me another shot.
translation.zh:
‎拜托你告诉我
‎你可以替我争取到多一个机会

translation.en: I'll try.
And if I succeed, you'll have to show them
translation.zh:
‎如果我争取到了
‎你就要证明给他们看

translation.en: why Asha Maurya cares about this so damn much.
translation.zh: ‎你艾莎·莫亚很重视这个项目的原因

translation.en: We're not bankers. We're beggars.
translation.zh: ‎我们不是银行家 而是乞丐

translation.en: If we can't tell a good story, our little tin cups remain empty.
translation.zh:
‎如果说不出一个好故事
‎杯子里一毛钱也没有

translation.en: You ruined my pitch.
Give me a heart attack while you die alone in a gutter?
translation.zh:
‎你想孤独地死在水沟里
‎让我心脏病发作吗？

translation.en: Mom, you can't send a DesiDream date to somebody's place of employment.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 叫相亲对象
‎去办公室找人是不对的

translation.en: Employment? This job doesn't pay Asha enough to buy a condo.
translation.zh:
‎办公室？这份工作还不足以
‎让艾莎买下一间高级公寓呢

translation.en: -Condos are a sound investment. -I don't want one.
translation.zh:
‎-高级公寓是一项不错的投资
‎-我不要高级公寓

translation.en: You should've never left banking. Your whole future was secure!
translation.zh:
‎你当初不应该离开银行界
‎如今你的未来都毁了

translation.en: -I got it. -Oh, here we go again.
Suneeta, don't make enemies with a crocodile that shares your waters.
translation.zh: ‎苏妮塔 别与同一个水域的鳄鱼为敌

translation.en: You know, that is so true, Mr. M. About crocodiles.
translation.zh: ‎伯父 这鳄鱼的比拟也太贴切了

translation.en: You're an economist, Vijay, not a greeting card writer.
translation.zh: ‎你是经济学家 不是贺卡写手

translation.en: I'm just sharing wisdom of their dada-ji.
translation.zh: ‎我只是跟他们分享哒哒吉的教诲

translation.en: Nick, that's Priya's grandfather.
translation.zh: ‎尼克 “哒哒吉”是指普莉雅的爷爷

translation.en: Did she tell you about his boat?
translation.zh:
‎她有没有跟你说过
‎她爷爷以前有一艘船？

translation.en: -Please, Dad. No. -Boat? No.
translation.zh:
‎-老爸 别说了
‎-一艘船？没提过

translation.en: -[Nick] I love boats. -So boring.
translation.zh:
‎-我最喜欢船了
‎-很没劲儿的故事

translation.en: Okay, Mom?
All I'm asking is that you take down this biodata and stop arranging dates.
translation.zh:
‎我只要你拿下我的个人资料
‎别再给我安排相亲了

translation.en: -Sorry, bio what? -Biodata.
Like a resume, except your mom writes it. Instead of getting a job, you get married.
translation.zh:
‎犹如一份履历表 但是你妈写的
‎目的不是找工作 而是结婚

translation.en: No, no, no, no. This is not biodata. This is a modern online profile.
translation.zh:
‎不是 这不是个人资料
‎这是现代网络帐户

translation.en: A nice way to meet a nice boy like this.
translation.zh: ‎这种方法很适合用来结识这种乖男孩

translation.en: -Meet Ravishanka Shah. -Suneeta.
Youngest Indian to win the National Spelling Bee.
translation.zh:
‎全国拼字比赛
‎最年轻的印度籍冠军得主

translation.en: -Mom. -Went to MIT at 16.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈
‎-16岁就进了麻省理工学院

translation.en: -Mom. -Look, look!
"Hello, I'm a very good boy. I studied at MIT. I run a successful--"
translation.zh:
‎“你好 我是个很乖、很听话的孩子
‎毕业于麻省理工学院 ‎-我有一个成功的…”
‎-妈妈！

translation.en: Mom!
This poor boy's ma wrote this. He has no idea it exists.
translation.zh:
‎这份个人资料是他妈妈写的
‎这个可怜的孩子并不知情

translation.en: [Vijay] Suneeta.
Enjoy your feast. This arguing is chewing my brains.
translation.zh:
‎好好吃饭 听你们争吵不休
‎我的头痛得要命

translation.en: Enjoy. This plate is for the husband who should be here.
translation.zh:
‎好好吃？
‎这个空盘子是给缺席的女婿准备的

translation.en: I told her not to do this. Don't get mad at me.
translation.zh: ‎我劝过她别这么做的 别生我的气

translation.en: Well, I will be calling you Mom soon enough.
Oh, this biryani looks so good.
translation.zh: ‎这盘印度香饭看起来很好吃的样子

translation.en: It's just rice.
And we don't really roll our Rs.
-[sighs] -Careful, it's spicy.
-I love sp-- [coughs] -Oh!
[Priya] You okay, babe?
Mom, I'm not gonna meet this Ravi guy.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 我绝对不会去见
‎这个叫拉维的男人

translation.en: Fine. Make me a liar.
translation.zh: ‎很好 那我岂不是说谎骗人了？

translation.en: My God. You already told his mom I'm gonna meet him, didn't you?
translation.zh:
‎天啊 你已经跟他妈妈说好
‎我会去见他了 对吧？

translation.en: Beta, I can't let you give up just because of that bekaar Krish.
translation.zh:
‎我不希望你因为那个没用的克里什
‎而放弃幸福啊！

translation.en: Krish? This isn't about Krish. Why does everyone think it is? It's not!
translation.zh:
‎克里什？这事跟克里什无关
‎为什么大家都认为跟他有关？

translation.en: -Calm down. -I am over it. Why can't you be? God!
translation.zh:
‎-冷静点
‎-我放下了 你们怎么还放不下？天啊

translation.en: Why would you mention Krish?
Well, what am I supposed to do?
[exhales] Just keep calm and curry on.
-No, stop. -I don't know why I said that.
translation.zh:
‎-别说了
‎-我怎么会说出那个段子？

translation.en: [Priya] Hey. You okay, sis?
Yeah.
[Priya] Okay, I need you to do me a favor.
You and Mom can't go on like this. I have too much on my plate.
translation.zh:
‎你和妈妈不能再闹下去了
‎我要处理的事够多了

translation.en: And I don't want Mom to be miserable at my wedding.
translation.zh: ‎我不要妈妈在我的婚礼上板着脸

translation.en: So you want me to be miserable instead?
It's one date.
It's a lie, Pri.
-You lied about other boyfriends. -Shh.
translation.zh:
‎-你也瞒着妈妈交过好几个男朋友啊
‎-小声点

translation.en: -[whispers] Not in front of them. -[Priya] You mean Ganesh and his gods?
translation.zh:
‎-别在他们面前说
‎-你是指象头神和他的神队友吗？

translation.en: -[Asha] Yeah. -They already know.
Come on, I was 16. There was nothing to tell.
translation.zh: ‎得了吧 当年我才16岁 没什么好说的

translation.en: Honestly, I don't think Mom and Dad want to know the truth.
translation.zh:
‎说真的 我认为爸妈并不想知道
‎我们到底做过什么

translation.en: The fact we used to sneak out to watch R-rated films?
translation.zh: ‎你是指偷溜出去看限制级电影吗？

translation.en: Or the fact that you and Nick freaking live together?
translation.zh: ‎还是指你和尼克同居的秘密？

translation.en: Shh.
Can you please help me out here?
Be a maverick in three months.
translation.zh:
‎在接下来三个月内
‎继续当个独立独行的人

translation.en: In the meantime, if you want to be left alone,
translation.zh:
‎与此同时
‎如果你不想让他们干涉你的生活

translation.en: go on the date.
Okay, fine. I'll meet your little MIT genius.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我答应去见
‎你说的那个麻省理工学院天才

translation.en: But no more setups and you have to take down that profile.
translation.zh:
‎但之后别再给我安排相亲了
‎还要删除我的帐户

translation.en: Okay, okay, as long as you agree to go to the weddings also.
translation.zh:
‎好的 但前提是你要答应我
‎去出席这些婚礼

translation.en: -What? -It's the best place to find a husband.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-婚礼是找老公最理想的地方

translation.en: I thought online was.
That's also best.
Mom, I have a life.
This is your life too.
You see this one?
Sona's father picked us up from the airport when we moved to this country.
translation.zh:
‎当初我们刚搬来美国时
‎是索娜的父亲到机场接我们

translation.en: We had nothing. Eight dollars and the clothes on our backs.
translation.zh:
‎当年我们什么都没有
‎身上只有八块钱和几件衣服

translation.en: Really? What was in your suitcases?
The clothes that weren't on our backs.
And this one.
Rohit’s mom took care of you when Priya was born.
translation.zh:
‎普莉雅出生时
‎是罗西的妈妈替我照顾你的

translation.en: That was Kumail's mom.
No. I remember Kumail's mom was having her gallbladder out. It was Rohit's mom.
translation.zh:
‎不是 我记得当时库马尔的妈妈
‎在做胆囊切除术 ‎肯定是罗西的妈妈

translation.en: Okay, guys, I… I know that these are your friends--
translation.zh: ‎行了 我知道这些人都是你们的朋友

translation.en: Not friends, Asha. Family. Community.
translation.zh: ‎不是朋友 艾莎 是家人 是社群

translation.en: To you these are just weddings, but to us this is a celebration of a life we built.
translation.zh:
‎在你看来 这些只是婚礼
‎但在我们看来 ‎这些庆祝我们努力打拼换来的生活

translation.en: From eight dollars.
Do you understand that I may not want a husband or partner in my life?
translation.zh:
‎你们知不知道
‎我这辈子可能不想结婚吗？

translation.en: Oh! No! [sobbing]
-No! -Suneeta?
Oh, beta. I can't let you give up on a lifetime of happiness.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 妈妈不准你
‎就这样放弃一辈子的幸福

translation.en: Beta, we just want what's best for you.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我们都是为了你好

translation.en: I know what you're doing.
You always do this.
Fine. I'll go to some weddings.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我去参加几场婚礼就是了

translation.en: -Not some. All. Show we're not ashamed. -Mom.
translation.zh:
‎-场场都得去 给人家看我们多大方
‎-妈妈

translation.en: Look, if you do this, I'll take down your profile.
translation.zh: ‎如果你答应我 我就删除你的帐户

translation.en: -Great. -But you still have to meet Ravi.
translation.zh:
‎-好啊
‎-但你还是得跟拉维见面

translation.en: I have a good feeling about him.
-No. -Please.
-Mom, no! -Yes.
-Mom! No! -Chup!
[chuckles] Ravishankar Shah?
-Oh. Hi! Um, just-- -Ravi?
Just Ravi.
-Do you mind if we order? I'm starving. -Sure. Um, nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-介意马上点餐吗？我快饿坏了
‎-没问题 幸会

translation.en: What'll it be?
Hi. Let me get a double-cheddar burger, sloppy fries, large, and a water. Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎一份双切达汉堡、大份奶酪酱炸薯条
‎再来一杯清水 谢谢

translation.en: And he'll have a… What do you have for “strict vegetarian seeks simple girl"?
translation.zh:
‎他要一份… ‎你们有没有叫
‎“寻找平凡女孩”的纯素套餐？

translation.en: Not strict, not vegetarian.
I'll have the same. Just Coke, not water. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎给我一份跟她一样的套餐
‎只要把清水换成可乐就行了 谢谢

translation.en: -[register keys chime] -That'll be…
Including 6.625 percent tax, 21.40.
translation.zh: ‎包含6.625%消费税 总共是21.40美元

translation.en: Nice.
How'd you do that?
Oh, just a simple girl thing. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎这只是一个平凡女孩的看家本领

translation.en: [inhales] Thanks.
-Shall we? -Mm-hmm.
So, Ravi, can you really spell anything?
translation.zh: ‎拉维 你真的任何单词都会拼吗？

translation.en: A-N-Y-T-H--
-Come on. Very funny. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎得了吧 你真觉得好笑吗？

translation.en: Spell "logorrhea."
Listen, I don't dance on command. So…
translation.zh: ‎我不是那种喜欢被呼来唤去的人

translation.en: -Make your mom a liar? Spell "logorrhea." -Seriously? Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎-那你妈岂不是在骗人吗？拼出来吧
‎-你是认真的吗？

translation.en: Oh my God. Okay. Logorrhea. L-O-G-O-R-R-H-E-A. Logorrhea.
Well done.
-Thank you. -Definition?
Verbal diarrhea. Actually a good word for you. Ah.
translation.zh: ‎是“语泻”的意思 很适合用来形容你

translation.en: Bon appétit.
Your mom forgot to mention your wit. So subtle and sophisticated.
translation.zh:
‎你妈忘了提到
‎你是个才思敏捷、有深度的人

translation.en: -Yeah, yours left out a couple things too. -Okay, fine. Here it goes.
translation.zh:
‎-你妈也漏写了好几个点
‎-好吧 那我们开始吧

translation.en: Uh, I blew up my engagement to Jersey’s most eligible brown bachelor,
translation.zh:
‎我撕毁了跟新泽西州
‎最受欢迎印度单身汉的婚约

translation.en: alienated my closest friends, brought shame and calumny on my family.
translation.zh:
‎刻意疏离我的好朋友
‎使家人蒙受污名和耻辱

translation.en: I’m no longer allowed on public transport in Woodbridge.
translation.zh:
‎还被禁止使用
‎伍德布里奇镇的公交服务

translation.en: But that was a misunderstanding.
Yeah, I was just gonna say you're prettier in person.
Did your mom write that too?
translation.zh: ‎这也是你妈给你写的台词吗？

translation.en: No, that was actually all me.
Ravi.
Asha.
Literally, the only reason I agreed to meet you here
was so my mom would stop posting my profile online.
translation.zh:
‎是为了让我妈删除
‎我在相亲网站上的帐户

translation.en: So this…
Us…
…is never gonna happen.
Never gonna happen.
How can you be so sure?
Because our parents set this up.
So?
So?
Wow. Okay. Um, how about this? I just started a new job.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 那我就老实说了 我刚换工作

translation.en: It's consuming my life. I have no time for anything else, and I'm okay with that.
translation.zh:
‎新工作把我累坏了
‎我没时间谈恋爱 也不介意单身

translation.en: I just took a break from my job, which was consuming my life.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚开始休假
‎因为那份工作也把我累坏了

translation.en: I have all the time in the world, and I'm okay with that.
translation.zh: ‎我有的是时间 也很乐意谈恋爱

translation.en: So you basically, like, don't have a job?
translation.zh: ‎那你算是无业游民 对吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, actually, I--
What happened to being the start-up guy?
I made money off a start-up, but it's not who I am.
translation.zh:
‎我以前创业时确实挣了点钱
‎但我不喜欢那种生活

translation.en: I prefer to do what I love.
Most can't afford to make that choice.
See, that's interesting. Can't afford to or are afraid to?
translation.zh:
‎这句话可有意思了
‎是没有选择？还是害怕？

translation.en: See? We're doomed.
translation.zh: ‎看吧 我们注定没有结果

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay.
Oh, cheer up. You dodged a bullet.
translation.zh: ‎笑一个吧 你刚躲过了一劫

translation.en: Anyway, a girl must eat.
I'm gonna go.
-Okay. -Yeah. But, um…
Thank you. This has been interesting.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 跟你见面很有意思

translation.en: -Thanks for the burger. -Anytime.
Bon appétit.
Yeah.
[Ravi] Whoo! Happy birthday, Pops.
So, Mr. Senior Citizen, how does it feel?
Who'd have thought I’d be father to a man in his 30s who still acts like a child?
translation.zh:
‎谁会想到我儿子都30岁了
‎行为还像个小孩一样？

translation.en: [Veena] Not today, Dinesh. Ravi is here.
translation.zh:
‎迪内什 拉维难得在场
‎今天就别说这个了

translation.en: I got you this gift.
No, no, no. No presents.
I cannot enjoy my birthday until my son finds a wife.
translation.zh:
‎在我的儿子找到老婆之前
‎我无法开开心心地庆生

translation.en: He's trying. He went out with Asha.
translation.zh: ‎他在努力了 他去见了艾莎

translation.en: Ha! And realized that women want men not boys?
translation.zh:
‎他知道女人要的是男人
‎不是男孩吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Dinesh.
Dad, you wrote this misleading profile of me.
translation.zh:
‎你给我写了一篇
‎充满误导性的个人介绍

translation.en: Saying, "Looking for a simple girl." I don't want simple. Simple is boring.
translation.zh:
‎写什么“寻找平凡的女孩”
‎我不要平凡的女孩 平凡没劲儿

translation.en: You can't be so choosy.
-Dad, I'm proud of my life. -Oh, good.
translation.zh:
‎-老爸 我对自己的人生感到自豪
‎-很好

translation.en: Proud of no job, proud of never dating, proud of that T-shirt.
translation.zh:
‎对没工作、没有过对象感到自豪？
‎对那件衬衫感到自豪？

translation.en: You were so brilliant, Ravi. Huh? MIT!
translation.zh:
‎你以前多么出色啊
‎还考进了麻省理工学院！

translation.en: Dinesh, what's past is past.
translation.zh: ‎迪内什 过去的事就让它过去吧

translation.en: But now is the time for you to find a good girl.
-Mom. -Good, not boring.
There's nothing wrong with boring.
Please, beta. Just try.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 求你了 去试试看

translation.en: For me.
Okay fine, Mom. I'll try.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 妈妈 我会试试看

translation.en: Look what I found.
Files on your secret love affair with a British royal?
translation.zh:
‎你和英国皇室成员
‎秘密交往的机密档案？

translation.en: Those were destroyed.
These are case studies of every microloan our company has ever funded.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们公司
‎历年来的微型贷款研究案例

translation.en: Plus, a 1997 swimsuit edition of Foxy Gals magazine.
translation.zh:
‎还有一本
‎1997年出版的成人杂志泳装特辑

translation.en: Now, I know this isn't yours.
Don't be so sure. I did go to college.
translation.zh:
‎别一口咬定不是我的
‎我也当过大学生

translation.en: So folders. Like the 1800s?
More like the last 25 years.
translation.zh: ‎说是过去25年留下的档案更贴切点

translation.en: I want you to analyze these and learn what we do, how we do it, and why we do it.
translation.zh:
‎我要你好好分析
‎学习我们公司的作风、做法和初衷

translation.en: -[Asha] That could take all summer. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎这要一整个夏天才看得完吧

translation.en: I want you to be so brilliant, Singapore can't say no.
translation.zh:
‎我要你出色得
‎连新加坡客户也拒绝不了你

translation.en: But they did say no.
translation.zh: ‎但我已经被新加坡客户拒绝了

translation.en: I spoke to the higher-ups in London and a personal friend.
translation.zh:
‎我跟伦敦的高层
‎和一个私底下的好友说了

translation.en: They'll see if they can pull strings to bring them back.
translation.zh:
‎他们会帮我们牵线
‎看看能不能让他们回来

translation.en: -If you screw up this time… -Heads will roll.
translation.zh:
‎-如果这次你又糊了…
‎-那就人头落地

translation.en: [man] That's a bit medieval.
But yes, your head and mine.
translation.zh: ‎但如果真糊了 我们的确会人头落地

translation.en: I'll also probably lose my job. I'll have to take my kid out of preschool.
translation.zh:
‎我也很可能会失业
‎到时我的孩子就无法再去上学前班

translation.en: -There goes Princeton! -Ambitious, this one.
translation.zh:
‎-以后也进不了普林斯顿大学
‎-这个女人野心好大

translation.en: Come, come.
-Mom, I'm at work. -Oh, no. Don't "I'm at work" me.
translation.zh:
‎-妈 我还在上班
‎-别用这种借口打发我

translation.en: Now what did I do?
-You behaved like a total fool! -What?
Pooja Patel told me you gave Ravi Shah diarrhea!
translation.zh:
‎普佳·帕特尔跟我说
‎你害拉维·萨腹泻了

translation.en: What? No! I asked him to spell logorrhea.
translation.zh:
‎我哪有？我只是叫他拼出
‎“logorrhea”这个单词

translation.en: -What's that? -Verbal diarrhea.
You mean diarrhea from the mo…
Oh. Well, you better behave at the next wedding or our deal is off!
translation.zh:
‎下一场婚礼上 你最好给我老实点
‎不然我们说好的就不算数

translation.en: [Hindu priest] Today, our bride and groom come together
translation.zh: ‎今天 新郎新娘聚在这里

translation.en: to celebrate both the Hindu and Jewish traditions,
translation.zh: ‎庆祝印度和犹太文化的结合

translation.en: to learn the best of what each has to offer,
confirming that love, spoken of in all religions,
translation.zh: ‎并且确立这份爱 正如所有宗教说说

translation.en: is our true meeting place.
It is their promise to be honest, open, loyal, and devoted to one another.
translation.zh:
‎他们承诺将对彼此
‎坦诚、忠贞 并且相亲相爱

translation.en: This responsibility speaks of faith and the love and support of your friends.
translation.zh:
‎这份责任代表着信仰
‎以及来自亲友的爱与支持

translation.en: [wedding guest] Mazel tov!
I lost Nick to the uncles.
Better than the bridesmaids.
Beats getting hit on by that spelling bee nerd.
translation.zh:
‎他被一个
‎拿过拼字比赛冠军的宅男搭讪

translation.en: "Hi, I'm Ravi. I went to MIT. Wanna play Bananagrams with me?"
translation.zh:
‎“你好 我是拉维 麻省理工学院毕业
‎要不要玩香蕉拼字游戏？”

translation.en: "No, thanks, Mr. Nerd. I'd rather clean a shower drain."
translation.zh:
‎“不了 谢谢
‎宅男先生 我宁可去清理水沟”

translation.en: -You're the nerd. -Mm-hmm.
Yeah. I'm a nerd. I'm a nerd. I love nerds.
translation.zh: ‎我也是个宅女 我最喜欢宅男了

translation.en: SAT scores through the roof!
translation.zh: ‎我的高考成绩可是名列前茅的

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna go. -Good save, though. Smooth. -Yeah. Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 我走了
‎-救场成功 很顺

translation.en: You look thirsty.
Uh, I was actually just leaving.
Oh, you're leaving this time?
-Why tell Pooja Patel about our date? -Pooja who?
translation.zh:
‎为什么把我们相亲的事
‎告诉普佳·帕特尔？ ‎谁是普佳·帕特尔？

translation.en: Pooja Patel, the gossip queen of Little India?
translation.zh: ‎小印度区的八卦女王普佳·帕特尔

translation.en: I didn't tell anyone. Why would I tell someone?
translation.zh:
‎我没跟任何人说过
‎为什么这种事要跟别人说？

translation.en: Huh. She was spying on us.
Unbelievable.
Asha, darling.
Ravi. Did you call my niece Twinkle?
translation.zh:
‎拉维 你给我的侄女小晶
‎打电话了吗？

translation.en: [Sheela Auntie] She's Miss India, New Jersey, you know.
translation.zh: ‎人家可是新泽西州印度美后 你懂的

translation.en: -Nah, Pinky Au-- -She's no brain like you, huh?
translation.zh:
‎-没有 红姨
‎-你嫌她没有你聪明 对吧？

translation.en: But a spelling bee is no Nobel Prize.
translation.zh:
‎你只是拼字比赛冠军
‎又不是诺贝尔奖得主

translation.en: Pinky, leave Ravi. Ravi has time. But Asha.
translation.zh:
‎红姨 你就饶了拉维吧
‎拉维有的是时间 艾莎可不同了

translation.en: Suneeta must be desperate.
All these doctors and lawyers and PhDs, they will be snapped up in no time.
translation.zh: ‎医生、律师、博士很快就会被抢光了

translation.en: And you will be stuck with leftovers.
Think of the shame! Krish getting married to a younger woman so soon.
translation.zh:
‎说到奇耻大辱 克里什就快结婚了
‎新娘是个更年轻的女人

translation.en: -Oh my God. You didn't know. Bechari. -Bechari, Asha, beti. Arre.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 你不知道吗？真可怜
‎-艾莎 我真同情你

translation.en: You know, really, I'm fine.
No. You know what?
Best thing, you get your revenge and get engaged quickly.
translation.zh: ‎你现在能做的就是赶紧订婚报复他

translation.en: Oh, I'm not looking for revenge.
I'm looking for a bit of time to focus on my career.
translation.zh: ‎我先要腾出时间专心经营事业

translation.en: Darling, careers fade away, but a husband and a family?
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 事业不是永久的
‎唯有丈夫和家人…

translation.en: Those are forever, darling.
They're handing out wedding favors if you wanna…
Beta, don't worry.
We promise not to give up on you until we know that you're happy.
translation.zh:
‎我们答应你 在你找到幸福之前
‎绝对不会放弃你

translation.en: Happy.
-A hundred percent. -Yes.
But… can't you see?
I am happy.
Thrilled, in fact, 'cause I met someone too.
translation.zh: ‎简直开心到飞起 因为我找到对象了

translation.en: My Indian Prince Charming right here.
translation.zh: ‎我的印度白马王子就在我身边

translation.en: You two? [giggles] No, no, no.
I heard from Pooja Patel it was a disaster.
translation.zh:
‎我听普佳·帕特尔说
‎你们见面时简直是灾难现场

translation.en: Disaster? Us? No.
We are the opposite of disaster. We are perfect together.
translation.zh: ‎跟灾难正好相反 我们简直天生一对

translation.en: Aren't we, Rav? Ravi?
-Uh-huh. -[Asha] Ravster.
She's the simple girl I always wanted, you know? Right, Asha? Shh.
translation.zh:
‎她就是我一直
‎在寻找的平凡女孩 对吧 艾莎？

translation.en: Very good. Good luck to you and your simple girl.
translation.zh: ‎祝你和你的平凡女孩交往顺利

translation.en: Chalo, Pinky. Let's go.
We'll see.
Seriously?
-They're gone, aren't they? -Yeah, to spread the news.
translation.zh:
‎-她们不是走了吗？
‎-可是她们会到处散播消息

translation.en: Come on, I'll just tell them we broke up at the next wedding.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 我会在下一场婚礼上
‎宣布我们已经分手了

translation.en: Then they'll just keep coming back. So, yeah, good luck.
translation.zh: ‎然后她们会继续缠着我们 加油

translation.en: -Wait. What if I didn't say that? -Okay.
translation.zh: ‎等等 如果我不说我们分手了呢？

translation.en: Would it be so bad to let people think we're off the market?
translation.zh:
‎让别人知道我们名花名草有主了
‎也不是坏事啊

translation.en: Is this how you're gonna ask me out?
translation.zh: ‎你在问我要不要跟你交往吗？

translation.en: I am not asking you out. Not for real, anyway.
translation.zh: ‎我没要跟你交往 只是假装跟你交往

translation.en: -I dunno where you're going with this. -You don't have to do anything!
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道你在想什么
‎-你什么也不用做

translation.en: Just fend off the matchmaking aunties so I can get some work done.
translation.zh:
‎只要能帮我挡住那些媒婆
‎让我专心工作就可以了

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Hmm. What's in it for me?
You get your life back.
I have my life.
Uh, no, you don't.
Come on.
[Asha] Think about it. How many Indian weddings are you invited to?
translation.zh: ‎你被邀请参加多少场印度婚礼？

translation.en: -Sixteen. -Nineteen.
We go to the ones we're both invited to. Brings it down to 14.
translation.zh: ‎我们只需要参加我们都受邀的婚礼 ‎也就是14场

translation.en: -How'd you come up with that? -Math whiz. Don't question the numbers.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么算出来的？
‎-我是数学大师

translation.en: Well, Asha, I'm not even agreeing to one.
If we join forces, we won't have to deal with all of this.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们联手
‎就不用面对这种麻烦了

translation.en: -Some people enjoy this. -Do you, Ravi?
translation.zh:
‎-有些人就喜欢参加婚礼
‎-那你喜欢吗？

translation.en: You wanna lie, tell everyone we're dating.
translation.zh:
‎严格说来
‎你就是想欺骗亲朋戚友我们在交往

translation.en: Not lie, just role-play until wedding season's over.
translation.zh:
‎不是欺骗 只是角色扮演
‎直到婚礼季结束为止

translation.en: I'm offering you a choice.
Summer with me or summer with…
translation.zh: ‎跟我一起度过夏天 还是跟…

translation.en: her.
Hi, Pinky Auntie.
Yeah, I'm gonna pass on both.
Fine, I'll pay you. Fifty bucks a wedding.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我付钱给你
‎每场婚礼给你50美元

translation.en: God. You're kidding me.
-Seventy-five. -No.
-One hundred, final offer. -Five hundred.
-What? -I'm kidding. [chuckles]
Seriously, I'm not interested in a pretend relationship, okay?
translation.zh: ‎说真的 我对搞假恋情不感兴趣

translation.en: Can we please focus?
Don't be so selfish. Do this for your parents.
translation.zh: ‎别这么自私 就当是为了你爸妈

translation.en: At least until wedding season is over.
translation.zh: ‎起码坚持到婚礼季结束为止

translation.en: He agreed to fake date you? What's wrong with him?
translation.zh: ‎他竟然答应跟你假交往？他有病吗？

translation.en: Actually, what's wrong with you?
I'm a genius, that's what's wrong with me.
translation.zh: ‎我是天才 这就是我的病

translation.en: What you gonna do when mom finds out?
She'll be thrilled. That's the whole point.
translation.zh:
‎她肯定开心到飞起
‎这就是我的主要目的

translation.en: How do half a billion women wear these things?
translation.zh:
‎世上五亿女性
‎是怎么穿上这身衣裳的？

translation.en: Yeah, she'll be thrilled until she finds out the truth.
translation.zh:
‎她会开心到飞起
‎直到她发现真相为止

translation.en: Relax. He's an MIT start-up founder. He's every mom's dream.
translation.zh:
‎别担心
‎他是麻省理工学院毕业的初创企业家 ‎他是所有妈妈的梦想

translation.en: [sighs] And the best part is, nobody has to be miserable anymore.
translation.zh:
‎最开心的是
‎再也没有人会愁眉苦脸了

translation.en: Dad, please just let me buy you a new dishwasher?
translation.zh:
‎老爸 你就让我
‎给你买一部全新的洗碗机吧

translation.en: That is so typical of your generation, huh?
translation.zh: ‎这就是你们这一代年轻人的德行

translation.en: Throw money every time there's a little problem.
You know, Dad, um, you'll be happy to hear this, actually, um…
translation.zh: ‎老爸 有件事你听了肯定会很高兴

translation.en: -I'm gonna see Asha again. -Oh really?
translation.zh:
‎-我和艾莎约好再见一次面
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Hmm.
She agreed?
Yeah, Dad, she agreed.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 老爸 她答应了

translation.en: To go out with you again?
Yes.
Are you sure?
Yeah, Dad, I'm sure.
Bete, listen to me.
Don't let this opportunity pass you by. Act quickly.
translation.zh: ‎别错过这个大好机会 行动要快

translation.en: Okay Dad, we just met.
Sure. But now is the time to make your move.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但你是时候采取行动了

translation.en: Before she finds out what we've been up to.
translation.zh: ‎趁她还没发现我们的“诡计”前

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles] Listen Dad, I'm running late.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 老爸 我快迟到了

translation.en: Yeah.
Please don't hurt your back, okay?
Ravi, remember what your mother said.
translation.zh: ‎拉维 记住你妈说过的话

translation.en: The past is the past. There's no need to bring it up.
translation.zh: ‎过去的事就让它过去吧 没必要重提

translation.en: Shh.
Bye, Dad.
Veena, he's got another date!
translation.zh: ‎薇娜 我们儿子又去约会了！

translation.en: Hey, I have singles.
Asha's happiness is worth more than one dollar.
translation.zh: ‎我们女儿的幸福何止一块钱？

translation.en: So is mine.
Suneeta, you're quite the matchmaker, huh?
translation.zh: ‎苏妮塔 你这个媒人不错嘛

translation.en: Yes. Asha and Ravi made quite the cute couple at Sona's wedding.
translation.zh:
‎对啊 在索娜的婚礼上
‎艾莎和拉维看起来挺登对的

translation.en: -Really? -The spelling bee guy?
You could even say, unbelievable.
What is so unbelievable about that?
Well, go and see for yourself.
[in Hindi] Hai raam.
[in English] Vijay, very handsome.
-Oh, do you have change for a twenty? -Sure.
[Suneeta] Vijay!
Vijay! Quickly. Quickly!
Look.
-That's him. -Yeah.
-[Suneeta] He's tall. -[Vijay] He's sitting.
Yeah, but you can tell.
Take a picture. Get your camera.
Some light reading?
Oh. Yeah.
You work in finance, right?
Um, microfinance.
Hmm, that's the tiny kind, right?
That's a bit reductive, but yeah.
translation.zh: ‎规模确实比较小 但你说得对

translation.en: I'm trying to create a lending initiative for women in Southeast Asia so they can start their own businesses.
translation.zh:
‎我想在东南亚推出一项贷款项目
‎协助当地女性创业

translation.en: Wow, okay. That is impressive.
Thank you.
Maybe read a couple of those and if we find time, do a lap around the room.
translation.zh:
‎你先读几篇文章吧
‎有时间的话 我们绕祈祷室一圈

translation.en: You know, say hi to the deities. Keep up appearances and stuff.
translation.zh: ‎跟神明打声招呼 露露脸

translation.en: -Maybe in a little while. -Okay.
Or we could give tips to your brother-in-law on how to pray, 'cause…
translation.zh: ‎也可以教你未来妹夫怎么祈祷 因为…

translation.en: What is he doing?
-You think he's gonna down dog? -It's very possible.
Oh, Nick.
It was endearing in the beginning. But now it's just…
translation.zh: ‎起初我觉得挺可爱的 可是现在…

translation.en: Yeah, I wish he'd be himself. The low-key guy I fell in love with.
translation.zh:
‎我真希望他能够做自己
‎做那个我当初爱上的低调男

translation.en: Nick's still that guy.
Weddings make people crazy. I would know, okay?
translation.zh: ‎婚礼会把人逼疯 我懂 知道吗？

translation.en: Just talk to him. Come here, sit down.
translation.zh: ‎跟他谈谈就好了 我们坐下

translation.en: [Asha] This is for you.
Nani gave it to me when I got engaged.
translation.zh: ‎这是我订婚时奶奶送给我的

translation.en: [Priya] Oh my God.
Asha, are you sure?
Yes. [chuckles] Of course.
You gonna try it on?
You guys want some hot samosas?
Asha, Yoshi. Yoshi, Asha.
translation.zh: ‎艾莎 他是阿良 阿良 她是艾莎

translation.en: Hey.
-Yo, that's your fake girlfriend? Dude! -Shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-她就是你的假女朋友？不错嘛
‎-少说几句

translation.en: -Sorry! What? -And her sister, Priya.
-Priya. Hi. -I'm engaged.
-Doesn't change it. -What's with the van?
-I'm just helping Ravi out with stuff. -Just deliveries. Actually, we gotta go.
translation.zh:
‎-我在帮拉维…
‎-送点东西 我们赶时间

translation.en: Yeah. A busboy got stuck in a walk-in. We have to go save him.
translation.zh:
‎餐馆勤杂工被困在冷藏间里
‎我们要去救他出来

translation.en: -Okay. -We just stopped to say hi.
-See you at the wedding, yeah? -Yeah.
Nice seeing you.
Bye.
I… thought he had a start-up.
Maybe they're still… starting up.
translation.zh: ‎可能公司还停留在初创阶段

translation.en: Ravi!
Sorry I'm late.
Okay, save it. Some auntie thought I was single and put me on coconut duty.
translation.zh:
‎得了吧 有个阿姨以为我单身
‎叫我去准备椰子

translation.en: -Aunties. He's with me. We're a couple. -[aunties chuckle]
translation.zh:
‎嗨 两位阿姨 他是我的男朋友
‎我们是一对的

translation.en: And here's the thing, Asha.
Like, I don't like weddings either. But if you say you're gonna go, I mean, you go.
translation.zh:
‎我也不喜欢参加婚礼
‎如果你说你要出席 那就必须出现

translation.en: Okay, understood.
Look, I'll finish coconut duty.
What is coconut duty?
All right, give me that.
-Do you need a peeler? -No, you don't.
Thank you all so much for coming.
It's been so, so beautiful to spend the day with you.
translation.zh: ‎很开心能跟你们一起度过这一天

translation.en: Today isn't about being Hindu or Muslim.
translation.zh:
‎今天的重点
‎跟我们是印度人或穆斯林无关

translation.en: It's about being in love.
A love that in the past would have been impossible.
translation.zh: ‎以前这段爱情是不可能有结果的

translation.en: A love that our…
…our parents don't support.
But we still love them.
Lakshmi, you're the love of my life.
translation.zh: ‎拉克丝米 你是我今生的挚爱

translation.en: Today, tomorrow, always.
Are you okay?
Yeah.
I can't believe their parents didn't turn up.
translation.zh: ‎他们父母竟然没来 真是难以置信

translation.en: Well. Your parents, happiness. Your parents, happiness.
translation.zh:
‎有时候人总要
‎在父母和幸福之间做出选择

translation.en: -Shouldn't have to be a choice. -That's true.
translation.zh:
‎-这根本不应该是个选择题
‎-对啊

translation.en: -How's your pitch going? -It's going. Kind of.
translation.zh:
‎-你的推介会准备得怎么样了？
‎-有进展 算是吧

translation.en: Kind of?
[sighs] Yeah. Sometimes I feel like I shouldn't have left banking.
translation.zh:
‎有时候我觉得
‎我当初不应该离开银行业

translation.en: Come on. You're saving the world, right? One tiny step at a time.
translation.zh: ‎你可是在拯救世界啊 一步一步来

translation.en: No one said it'd be easy. Besides, there's always second chances.
translation.zh:
‎拯救世界谈何容易？
‎再说 总有第二次机会的

translation.en: Not always.
translation.zh: ‎不是每次都有第二次机会的

translation.en: Always. I mean, look at them, right?
translation.zh: ‎总有第二次机会的 你看他们俩

translation.en: They broke up 'cause their parents didn't want them together, but…
translation.zh: ‎因为父母反对一度分手 可是…

translation.en: -There they are, just going for it. -Hm.
translation.zh: ‎如今他们义无反顾地结婚了

translation.en: You know what?
Let's go dance.
-Really? -Yeah. We may never get a second chance.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-对啊 可能以后没有第二次机会了

translation.en: All right. Come on.
-Wanna go sizzle? -Let's go sizzle.
[whispers] I found it, over.
On my way, over.
Oh, wait. Did you find any pics of Dad's Members Only phase?
translation.zh:
‎等等 你有没有找到
‎老爸最丑阶段的照片？

translation.en: It ain't a phase if he still wears it. But I did find one with perms, over.
translation.zh: ‎无论任何年龄阶段 他都戴着眼镜 ‎不过我找到了他顶着蓬蓬头的照片

translation.en: -Ooh! -Check it out.
Ha! That is definitely going in the slideshow.
translation.zh: ‎这张一定要放在婚礼视频上

translation.en: Okay. Look at this.
That doesn't look fun.
Well, they only knew each other, like, three weeks.
translation.zh: ‎当时他们才认识了三个星期

translation.en: She must have been so scared.
Have you talked to Nick yet?
Uh. I haven't had the heart. He's now taking Bollywood dance lessons.
translation.zh:
‎我不想伤害他的自尊心
‎他已经开始上宝莱坞舞蹈课了

translation.en: -Thought you didn't want a dance routine. -I don't. It's way too much pressure.
translation.zh:
‎-你不是不想在婚礼上跳舞吗？
‎-对啊 压力太大了

translation.en: Okay, Pri, you gotta talk to him.
translation.zh: ‎普莉雅 你一定要跟他谈谈

translation.en: Do you think Mom had a boyfriend before Dad?
translation.zh:
‎你说妈妈在认识爸爸前
‎是不是交过一个男朋友？

translation.en: No. Impossible. He must be a cousin or something.
translation.zh: ‎不可能 肯定是她表哥什么的

translation.en: Look at your cousin like that?
translation.zh: ‎你会用这种眼神看着表哥吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but, I mean, Mom would never do something like that.
translation.zh: ‎不会 但妈妈绝对不会做那种事的

translation.en: Something like what, huh?
What are you two up to?
Uh, the wedding slideshow.
Oh. Very exciting. Is Ravi coming for lunch? I'm frying puris.
translation.zh: ‎真令人期待啊 ‎拉维来吃午饭吗？我在做炸脆饼

translation.en: Oh. Nah.
What nah? When are you going to let us meet him?
translation.zh:
‎不了？你打算什么时候
‎带他来见我们？

translation.en: When are you gonna let us meet him?
translation.zh: ‎对啊 什么时候带他来见我们？

translation.en: We're just not there yet.
Marriage is a lifetime of getting there. Invite him.
translation.zh:
‎婚姻是一辈子的事业
‎邀请他来我们家吃饭

translation.en: Ma, if you push, you know what's gonna happen.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 你再逼下去的话
‎知道会发生什么事了

translation.en: The way to a man's heart is through his stomach.
translation.zh: ‎要抓住男人的心 就要先抓住他的胃

translation.en: -That is so gross. -Or an angiogram.
translation.zh:
‎-好恶心
‎-或是通过冠状动脉造影

translation.en: That is also very gross.
You laugh, but it's the hollow, cynical laugh of the lonely.
translation.zh:
‎你还笑得出来？
‎你的笑声既空洞又虚假

translation.en: That was very harsh.
Yeah, this is gonna blow up in your face, Ash.
No, it's not. I know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: ‎不会的 我知道自己在做什么

translation.en: Well, I know Mom and Dad. Wait till they get too invested.
translation.zh:
‎我很了解爸妈
‎等他们过分投入时 你就完蛋了

translation.en: [whispers] It's just not gonna happen. Over and out.
translation.zh: ‎我和他是不可能的 通话结束

translation.en: So, Veena, Dinesh. We may have another wedding in our future.
translation.zh:
‎薇娜、迪内什
‎我们家可能很快就要办喜事了

translation.en: Pooja Patel heard from Pinky that they went straight from fizzle to sizzle.
translation.zh:
‎普佳·帕特尔听红姨说
‎他们俩的爱情起死回生了

translation.en: -So let's start planning a date! -What?
translation.zh:
‎-我们可以开始挑个良辰吉日了
‎-什么？

translation.en: [Veena] I told you!
Oh, after all these years of hoping, planning, praying, finally!
translation.zh:
‎这些年来 我们怀抱希望
‎不断筹备、不住祈祷 终于有结果了

translation.en: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. Pooja is a number one rascal.
translation.zh: ‎先别高兴得太早 普佳是个大话精

translation.en: I just know my Ravi's happier than he's ever been. I told him, "Just meet Asha."
translation.zh:
‎我发现我家拉维比以前更开心了
‎我都跟他说了 我叫他去跟艾莎见面

translation.en: "She's such a good girl. What's the harm?" Now, see?
translation.zh:
‎她是个好女孩 见个面又何妨？
‎如今你们看吧

translation.en: They think our way of doing things is old-fashioned and silly.
translation.zh:
‎他们年轻人老是觉得
‎我们老人家做事手法老土和不切实际

translation.en: Asha says our thinking is stuck in the India of 40 years ago.
translation.zh:
‎艾莎老是说我们的思想
‎停留在四十年前的印度

translation.en: But Asha became an economist like her old man. That's something.
translation.zh:
‎但艾莎不也像她爸一样
‎成为经济学家吗？ ‎这很了不起

translation.en: But she's too idealistic.
I admire you, Dinesh.
Running this restaurant, putting Ravi through college.
translation.zh: ‎经营这家餐厅 供拉维上大学

translation.en: It's no small feat.
I wanted more than this for him. [chuckles]
So tell us more about Ravi's company.
You know these start-ups, huh? So secretive.
translation.zh:
‎你们也懂初创公司的作风了
‎神神秘秘的

translation.en: -[Suneeta chuckles] -Who knows what he does.
Say no more. Asha doesn't want to tell us anything about her new job either.
translation.zh:
‎可不是吗？艾莎也不想跟我们透露
‎任何她工作上的事

translation.en: To our kids who think their parents know nothing.
translation.zh: ‎为两个以为我们一无所知的孩子干杯

translation.en: What would they do without us, huh?
translation.zh: ‎没有我们 他们能够成功吗？

translation.en: -Cheers! -Cheers!
-They'd be penniless. -And barren.
translation.zh:
‎-他们一毛钱也没有
‎-也不会有孩子

translation.en: [Tina] Okay, listen to this one.
Her alcoholic husband walked out right after their son was born.
translation.zh:
‎自从儿子出世后
‎她喝酒成性的丈夫就弃他们而去

translation.en: So then we gave her a loan to open a tea shop.
translation.zh:
‎于是我们为她提供贷款
‎让她可以开一家茶馆

translation.en: Her son became the first in her family to go to high school.
translation.zh:
‎后来她儿子成了
‎她家族里第一个考上高中的人

translation.en: Yeah, you know what this means? These loans were her lucky break.
translation.zh:
‎-知道这意味着什么吗？
‎-这项贷款改善了她的境遇

translation.en: Now that's a story to believe in.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个很有说服力的故事

translation.en: What are you all smiley, smiley about?
-The suits are coming back. -Singapore?
translation.zh:
‎-那几个大客户会再回来
‎-你是指新加坡客户？

translation.en: Yes!
-In a few weeks. -No!
Okay, just… I gotta get to work then.
Exactly. But not here.
translation.zh: ‎没错 但不是在办公室里

translation.en: One of our big donors is having a soiree and you're going to be my wingwoman.
translation.zh:
‎今晚有一场赞助商办的晚宴
‎我要你当我的女伴

translation.en: That is if you don't have another wedding.
translation.zh: ‎但前提是你今晚不用出席婚礼

translation.en: Oh, I did, but I told Ravi I have a sinus infection, so…
translation.zh:
‎我确实有一场婚礼
‎但我已经跟拉维说我鼻窦炎发作了

translation.en: Oh, that's a great plan. Fake being sick to fake out your fake boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎这个做法不错嘛 跟你的假男友装病

translation.en: Ever thought of getting out of this racket and going back to London?
translation.zh:
‎你有没有想过逃出这个局
‎回去伦敦发展？

translation.en: I hadn't until recently.
The head of our Southeast Asia division just quit.
translation.zh: ‎东南亚分行总经理刚辞职了

translation.en: -Couldn't handle the poverty. -Would you take that job?
translation.zh:
‎-他受不了穷人
‎-你怎么不接手呢？

translation.en: In a New York minute.
But it must be earned, love. Hence, the return of Singapore.
translation.zh:
‎但那个职位是要争取的
‎所以要看新加坡客户的意愿了

translation.en: No pressure there.
Look, I should go back to the office--
translation.zh: ‎詹姆斯 我还是回去办公室吧

translation.en: -Desert me and you're fired. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-你敢抛下我 我就开除你
‎-好吧

translation.en: Now, come on. Let's enjoy this bargain drink,
translation.zh:
‎别愁眉苦脸的
‎好好享受这杯便宜的酒

translation.en: this impossibly hip DJ, and whatever it is hanging in this room.
translation.zh:
‎这个超潮的DJ放的音乐
‎以及挂在宴会现场墙上的东西

translation.en: Hey, do you think that DJ would do Priya's wedding?
translation.zh:
‎你说这位DJ
‎愿意在普莉雅的婚礼上打碟吗？

translation.en: Maybe you should go check. And look out for donors on the way.
translation.zh:
‎你可以去问问他
‎顺便看看有没有合适的赞助商

translation.en: Copy that.
Hi.
Mr. DJ?
Um, I'm sorry to interrupt your set, and I don't want to cause offense.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉打扰你工作 希望你不会介意

translation.en: But is there any chance that you do weddings at all?
translation.zh: ‎你平常有没有在婚礼上演出？

translation.en: Uh, actually, someone's booked me solid on the Indian wedding circuit.
translation.zh:
‎我已经跟某人说好
‎陪她参加印度婚礼巡演了

translation.en: [Asha] Ravi?
Sinus infection cleared up?
Um, well, NyQuil.
-So you're-- -Spellbound. Am I right?
-Ravi, this is my boss… -James?
translation.zh:
‎-拉维 这位是我的上司…
‎-詹姆斯 对吧？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Yes.
You'd think they'd have nicer cheese at a fancy gig like this.
translation.zh:
‎这么高级的晚宴
‎还以为主办方会提供更好吃的奶酪

translation.en: That's butter, dude.
How do you both know each other?
I heard him play a few sets at a club in Ibiza back in my party boy days.
translation.zh:
‎我年少轻狂的时候
‎曾经在伊维萨岛听过他打碟好几次

translation.en: He brought the house down.
-[Ravi and James chuckle] -Clearly.
Okay.
Well, I'm gonna go schmooze.
-I'm gonna-- -Not you.
Enjoy the butter.
Thanks, buddy.
You want to grab some air?
Yeah, uh, I could do air.
translation.zh: ‎好啊 我不介意出去喘口气

translation.en: Air is good.
Keep it chill. No lasers.
translation.zh: ‎继续放些轻松的音乐 别开激光

translation.en: -Have a little faith, Rav. -I have no faith.
Nice to see you, Yoshi.
Nice to see you too. Is your sister still engaged?
translation.zh: ‎我也是 你妹妹跟未婚夫分手了吗？

translation.en: [Asha] Yes, she is.
[Yoshi] All right, cool.
How's everyone doing? All right.
DJ Spellbound's a little busy, so Yoshi's in the house.
translation.zh:
‎DJ拼魔有点忙过不来
‎从现在起 阿良当家！

translation.en: -So, DJ Spellbound, huh? -Mm-hmm.
-That's not ironic at all. -[chuckles]
You know, it started as joke, but, um, kinda just stuck.
translation.zh: ‎起初只是个玩笑 然后就固定下来了

translation.en: So, um, what's your big secret? Why don't you have a real boyfriend?
translation.zh:
‎聊聊你最大的秘密吧
‎为什么不交个真正的男朋友？

translation.en: Why don't I have a real boyfriend?
translation.zh: ‎为什么不交个真正的男朋友？

translation.en: I think it's a legit question here.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这是一个合理的问题

translation.en: Okay, yeah. It is.
After things ended with Krish, I figured why stop there?
translation.zh:
‎我和克里什分手后
‎我心想没必要原地打转

translation.en: So I quit my job, moved to Jersey in the hope of starting over in many ways.
translation.zh:
‎于是我辞去原来的工作
‎搬到新泽西州 ‎希望在各个方面展开新生活

translation.en: Of course, my mom thinks I quit banking just to spite her.
translation.zh:
‎我妈自然会觉得
‎我辞掉银行的工作是为了气她

translation.en: -Did you? -Probably.
So what about you? DJ… ing, how did that happen?
translation.zh:
‎那你呢？为什么会跑去打碟？
‎当初怎么会有这个想法？

translation.en: You know, my backup skill set is spelling incredibly esoteric words.
translation.zh:
‎我用来应急的技术
‎只有拼写很少人懂的英文单词

translation.en: Can't really make a living off that.
-Logorrhea. I mean… -Logorrhea.
But no, like, when I was a kid, everything I did was for my parents.
translation.zh:
‎其实我小时候
‎所做的一切都是为了讨好父母

translation.en: Right? Everything. Except music. Music was for me.
translation.zh:
‎对吧？除了音乐之外
‎音乐我是为自己做的

translation.en: I mean, music used to make me happy.
But, uh, lately, I don't know. I mean…
translation.zh: ‎只是最近 不知道怎么的

translation.en: I've been on the road for, like, ten years just working nonstop.
translation.zh: ‎过去十年以来 我马不停蹄地工作

translation.en: I don't know what I'm working for anymore.
translation.zh: ‎连为什么要工作也不知道了

translation.en: I figured I'd take a break, just come back home and fix my family.
translation.zh: ‎我想休息一下 回家跟家人联络感情

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's kind of complicated.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 事情有点复杂

translation.en: Damn it, Yoshi.
-I'm sorry. I gotta… -Yeah, you gotta go.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 我要…
‎-你还是过去吧

translation.en: -DJ stuff. -Yeah, I gotta… Right.
translation.zh:
‎-你要去打碟了
‎-是啊 我要去…没错

translation.en: Are we good?
We're good. We're cool. Yeah.
Great.
Yoshi!
Oh, God.
I can't believe he's Spellbound.
[Asha] Wait, you actually know who he is?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你知道“DJ拼魔”这号人物？

translation.en: I don't, I'm a nerd, but he's got like a gazillion followers.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 我是个宅女
‎只知道他有一大堆粉丝

translation.en: I do not trust DJs.
-[Asha chuckles] -Why? What's wrong with DJs?
I'm sure they're talented. I don't understand what they do,
translation.zh:
‎他们很有才华
‎只是我不理解他们的工作

translation.en: so don't respect it.
translation.zh:
‎所以他们得不到我的尊重
‎他在隐瞒什么？

translation.en: -What's he hiding? -I don't think he's hiding anything.
translation.zh:
‎所以他们得不到我的尊重
‎他在隐瞒什么？ ‎我不觉得他有所隐瞒
‎只是他从没提过自己的过去

translation.en: It just never came up.
translation.zh:
‎我不觉得他有所隐瞒
‎只是他从没提过自己的过去

translation.en: You've been to a bazillion weddings and never asked him about his background?
translation.zh:
‎你们一起参加过这么多场婚礼
‎却没问过他的背景？

translation.en: I… I didn't want him to get the wrong idea.
Ash, what if it's not the wrong idea?
translation.zh: ‎艾莎 万一他就是那个对的人呢？

translation.en: Priya, have you been talking to Mom again?
translation.zh:
‎普莉雅 你最近是不是经常
‎跟妈妈聊天？

translation.en: Let it happen. You want it, sis.
translation.zh:
‎大姐 你就顺其自然吧
‎你明明就喜欢人家

translation.en: -Shh! -[Priya] But--
What you want…
is a Mumbai Monster.
A Mumbai Monster.
What is it?
It's a masala mojito infused with cumin seeds and Kashmiri chilies.
translation.zh:
‎是一种印度香料鸡尾酒
‎含有枯茗籽和克什米尔辣椒粉

translation.en: It is…
That good, huh?
Oh my God. That's disgusting.
So what do we know about him?
Okay, he was born in Jersey City and he graduated MIT 2011.
translation.zh:
‎他出生于泽西市
‎2011年毕业于麻省理工学院

translation.en: My pal Joby graduated in 2010. I can see what I can find out.
translation.zh:
‎我的好兄弟乔比是2010届毕业生
‎看看我能从他那边探听到什么

translation.en: No, we're not snooping on Ravi.
translation.zh: ‎不要 别去打探拉维的底细

translation.en: [Nick] It's not snooping.
I'm collecting information about him without him knowing.
translation.zh: ‎我只是悄悄地收集他的情报

translation.en: If he is gonna join our family, we got to find out who he really is.
translation.zh:
‎如果他以后会成为我们的家人
‎我们就有必要给他起底

translation.en: He's not joining our family, guys, okay? We're just--
translation.zh: ‎他不会成为我们的家人 知道吗？

translation.en: You're just more than fake dating.
translation.zh: ‎你们的关系已经超出假约会的范围了

translation.en: You like him, admit it.
So Nick, how's the, um… How's the Hindi coming along?
translation.zh: ‎尼克 你的印度语学到什么程度了？

translation.en: [in Hindi] The bride is driving pickles around.
[in English] He's very good.
I said, "It's going great." Right?
Pretty much.
Hey, babe. Maybe you don't need to try so hard to impress Mom and Dad.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的
‎你没必要很刻意地去讨好我父母

translation.en: Yes, I do. I do.
Nick, you're a neurosurgeon.
translation.zh: ‎尼克 你是一个神经外科医生

translation.en: Here's the thing.
A binary craniotomy is nothing compared to planning an Indian wedding.
translation.zh:
‎比起筹备一场印度婚礼
‎开颅手术根本不算什么

translation.en: And I really want this to go well.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很希望我们的婚礼不会出差错

translation.en: My parents were barely married seven years.
translation.zh: ‎我父母结婚七年后就离婚了

translation.en: In Indian traditions, the souls are linked for seven lifetimes.
translation.zh:
‎在印度传统中
‎夫妻七生七世永不分离

translation.en: Wow, that's a long time, babe.
It's not nearly enough, pumpkin.
Okay.
[Asha] I am starving!
[Ravi] Me too. Who runs out of food at a wedding? Come on!
translation.zh: ‎我也是 哪有人办婚礼伙食不够的？

translation.en: [Asha] There wasn't even a garlic naan in sight. Whoa!
translation.zh: ‎连大蒜烤饼都没了 天啊

translation.en: Holy crap, Ravi.
You live here by yourself?
When I'm not traveling, yeah. I don't get to spend much time here, so…
translation.zh:
‎没出门的时候就住在这里
‎我很少待在家里 所以…

translation.en: It's kind of nice, being at home. Though I did have fun on the road.
translation.zh:
‎待在家里挺舒服的
‎但我也很喜欢出门旅行

translation.en: [Asha] Yeah, I can see that.
Anyway, you didn't finish your story. So you moved to Jersey… [Asha] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎对了 你的故事还没说完呢
‎你说后来你搬到新泽西州

translation.en: Now what?
-Now I change the world. -[Ravi chuckles]
No, but seriously, starting this fund up has been way harder than I expected.
translation.zh:
‎说真的 发起这项基金
‎比我想象中还要困难

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you know, anything worth doing is hard, right?
translation.zh: ‎值得做的事都很难 不是吗？

translation.en: I remember when I first started DJing
my parents threatened to stop paying for MIT. It was scary.
translation.zh:
‎我父母威胁我
‎要断了我的学费 吓死我了

translation.en: So what did you do?
I knew exactly what to do. I panicked.
translation.zh: ‎我很清楚要怎么反应 我紧张死了

translation.en: Parents, happiness. Happiness, parents.
translation.zh: ‎总要在父母和幸福之间做出选择

translation.en: Yeah. Here's to not letting them drown that inner voice.
translation.zh:
‎为我们内在的声音
‎没被父母淹没而干杯

translation.en: Although, you know what my inner voice is saying right now?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我内在的声音在说什么吗？

translation.en: What?
Yo quiero Taco Bell.
-Oh my God. -I need Taco Bell.
[chuckles] Okay, every Indian loves Taco Bell.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 印度人都爱吃塔可钟

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -Give me a sec.
-Where are the plates? -Uh, second cabinet.
[Asha] Okay.
Yoshi. Um, Good Samaritan needs, like, 27 number eights.
translation.zh: ‎阿良 好撒马利亚人需要27份8号盒饭

translation.en: Yeah. Patesh will meet you out back. And don't forget the mango pickle.
translation.zh:
‎帕特什会在后巷跟你会合
‎别忘了带走腌芒果

translation.en: Yeah, and do not be seen again.
All right.
Sorry.
It's okay. Um…
Yoshi works at your parents' restaurant?
translation.zh: ‎阿良在你父母的餐厅打工吗？

translation.en: Not exactly. You know, he just picks up stuff sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎不完全是 他只是去搬东西

translation.en: Uh-huh. And then he sends them to food banks.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？接着把东西送到食物银行

translation.en: Sometimes.
[whispers] Sometimes.
What's going on?
All right. Uh, I've been making these huge catering orders from Aroma
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我会定时向印度风味餐厅订餐

translation.en: and giving them to homeless shelters, food banks, Little League teams. [scoffs]
translation.zh:
‎然后送去收容中心
‎食物银行和少年棒球联盟

translation.en: Okay, but why through Yoshi?
My dad doesn't know.
You're doing this behind his back. That just feels wrong.
translation.zh: ‎你瞒着他去做这件事 这样不对吧？

translation.en: The restaurant is struggling, you know? And he's a stubborn man.
translation.zh:
‎餐厅生意不太好
‎加上他是个顽固的老家伙

translation.en: Yeah, anyway. Let's eat.
-I just have one question for you. -Hmm?
translation.zh:
‎-我还有一个问题想问你
‎-问吧

translation.en: Would you like some mango pickle with your quesalupa?
translation.zh:
‎想不想在你的“杂交塔可”中
‎加上腌芒果？

translation.en: You talking dirty to me?
I am stuffed.
There's another quesalupa with your name on it.
translation.zh: ‎那边有个“杂交塔可”是留给你的

translation.en: No mas for me.
Shh.
Listen.
What is it?
The sound of no aunties.
No Yoshi.
-No parents. -Mm-hmm.
Nobody left to fool.
I could be making a big mistake hanging out with, like, this cool DJ,
translation.zh:
‎跟一个擅长选音乐
‎掌控气氛、打碟的帅气DJ单独相处

translation.en: who, like, drops beats, turns tables, scratches things.
translation.zh:
‎跟一个擅长选音乐
‎掌控气氛、打碟的帅气DJ单独相处 ‎很可能是个大错

translation.en: Yeah, that's me.
I talk a lot when nervous. It's called logorrhea.
translation.zh:
‎我紧张的时候会说个不停
‎这种病叫“语泻”

translation.en: -You might've heard of it. -Right.
It's… It's this really long word. I don't know how to spell it…
translation.zh: ‎这个单词太长了 我都不会拼…

translation.en: Did you just kiss me?
Looked like you could use a kiss.
Are we still role-playing?
We're improvising.
Okay.
[scoffs] And I'm boring you. Wow.
translation.zh: ‎我竟然让你闷透了 天啊

translation.en: Sorry. It's not you.
-Uh-huh. It's the music, right? -Mm-mm.
Yeah, better be the music.
-What does a DJ actually do? -I like to think I make people happy.
translation.zh:
‎-DJ究竟是怎么样的职业？
‎-我认为是给人带来欢乐

translation.en: Make people happy?
Mm-hmm. I connect with people. I can feel their energy, you know?
translation.zh:
‎没错 我的工作是与人交流
‎我可以感受到他们的能量

translation.en: [Ravi] I can tell when their moods are shifting. I can build on it.
translation.zh:
‎可以感受到他们的心情变了
‎按照他们的心情选音乐

translation.en: Music's just something that brings people together, you know?
translation.zh: ‎音乐是一股将人团结在一起的力量

translation.en: I just love being a part of it. When I was a kid, I used to feel so lost…
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢沉浸在音乐中
‎我小时候总是觉得没有方向

translation.en: [Ravi] Asha?
Okay.
Nice moves.
-Hey! [chuckles] -Hey.
-Good morning. -Good morning.
-How are you feeling? -Great.
-I haven't slept that well in a long time. -Yeah, I noticed.
translation.zh:
‎-我好久没睡那么久了
‎-看得出来

translation.en: Hey, Ravi, about last night. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎拉维 我想就昨晚的事向你道歉

translation.en: You're sorry.
Yeah, that should never have happened.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 那种事不应该发生

translation.en: Right. No, you know, it's probably my fault.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 不是 也可能是我的错

translation.en: I should apologize. I shouldn't have had you here.
translation.zh:
‎该道歉的人是我
‎我不应该邀请你到我家的

translation.en: -No, Ravi-- -No, I get it. We had a deal.
translation.zh:
‎-不是的 拉维
‎-我懂 我们说好的

translation.en: No, Ravi.
I mean that I'm sorry that I fell asleep.
translation.zh:
‎我是指昨晚说着说着我就睡着了
‎我要就这件事向你道歉

translation.en: I wish I hadn't. I was having a really nice time.
translation.zh:
‎我真希望我没睡着
‎我昨晚过得很开心

translation.en: -Yeah? -Mm-hmm.
Me too.
But maybe we can just keep this to ourselves for a little while.
translation.zh: ‎但我们还是暂时别公开好了

translation.en: You want to fake that we're fake dating?
I don't want things to get weird.
Can we at least agree we like each other or…
translation.zh:
‎起码我们应该承认
‎我们是喜欢彼此的吧？

translation.en: I don't know.
-I'll take that as a yes. -Mm-hmm.
Though no one can know we really like each other.
translation.zh:
‎却不能让别人知道
‎我们是真心喜欢彼此的

translation.en: Exactly.
-[Ravi] Are you a dancer? -[Asha] Used to be.
♪ We're getting closer But we're trying to be friends ♪
translation.zh: ‎（说唱风格 节奏 能量 天马行空）

translation.en: ♪ If we start it might never end So we keep tiptoeing ♪
translation.zh: ‎（财务 父母 投资 父权制）

translation.en: ♪ So much at risk And I am scared to lose ♪
-I gotta check that. Sorry. -No, you don't.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 我得查看这条短信
‎-不用道歉

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no, no, no. -What?
It's James. Singapore's coming back. They're gonna be here in nine hours.
translation.zh:
‎是詹姆斯 他说新加坡客户来了
‎九小时后抵达公司

translation.en: On a Sunday?
Yeah. I'm not ready. I dropped the ball. I have five years of stories left.
translation.zh:
‎对啊 我还没准备好 我失败过一次了
‎我还有五年的故事还没看好

translation.en: Asha, I've seen you bust your ass all summer
translation.zh:
‎艾莎 整个夏天下来
‎我看你忙得焦头烂额

translation.en: going through these boxes looking for this story to believe in.
translation.zh: ‎从这些箱子里寻找值得相信的故事

translation.en: I don't wanna overstep, but I don't think you'll find that story in a box.
translation.zh:
‎不是我多事
‎但我认为箱子里没有你要找的故事

translation.en: What does that mean?
You're the story. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎你就是那个故事 知道吗？

translation.en: For what it's worth, I believe in that story like I believe in you.
translation.zh:
‎不管说这个有没有用
‎我相信那个故事 就如我相信你一样

translation.en: They'll believe in you.
I'm scared, Ravi.
Everybody's scared.
But you've done the hard work already, right?
Now you just gotta own what you want, listen to your heart,
translation.zh:
‎如今你只需要接纳自己想要什么
‎倾听内心的声音

translation.en: and just let your love be greater than your fear.
Come here.
You got this.
Ready to clean out the bank of Singapore?
translation.zh: ‎准备好清空新加坡的银行了吗？

translation.en: Beat you to it.
Excuse me. You're making progress.
Now, get changed, and let's go knock their Gucci socks off.
translation.zh: ‎去换件衣服 让他们大开眼界

translation.en: I am changed.
Right.
You sure?
Sure.
Thank you.
When I was three years old,
I shocked my parents by calculating a 12% tip on a pizza delivery.
translation.zh:
‎父母对我算出
‎披萨外送服务12%的小费感到震惊

translation.en: Numbers've never failed me.
But today, I am not here to talk about numbers.
I'm here to talk about her.
When we gave Chinda a loan to open her tailor shop,
translation.zh: ‎当年我们为欣达提供开裁缝店的贷款

translation.en: we gave her a new life.
We also gave her daughters the ability to become the first in their family to attend high school.
translation.zh:
‎我们还让她几个女儿
‎成为家族里第一批上高中的人

translation.en: Like Chinda, my grandfather… my dada-ji, also received a loan.
translation.zh: ‎我爷爷的情况跟欣达一样 ‎当年他也是贷款项目的受益人

translation.en: When floods destroyed his crops in the small town called Mirzapur,
translation.zh:
‎当年在米尔扎布尔镇
‎水灾将他的农作物都毁了

translation.en: he moved to Mumbai and borrowed 1000 rupees to buy this boat.
translation.zh:
‎于是他搬到孟买
‎借了1000卢比买下这艘船

translation.en: With the money that he made fishing,
he was able to send my father to Ohio State to study economics,
translation.zh: ‎把我爸送到俄亥俄州学习经济学

translation.en: making my dad the first in our family to finish college.
translation.zh:
‎使我爸成为家族里
‎第一个大学毕业的成员

translation.en: I am standing in this room today because of this boat
translation.zh:
‎今天我会站在这个房间里
‎就是因为这艘船

translation.en: and because of the sacrifices that my parents made
to make sure their children had a better life.
translation.zh: ‎他们要确保孩子们过上更美好的人生

translation.en: Our story is a reminder
that these loans aren't just a chance to change a woman's life,
translation.zh:
‎这些贷款项目
‎不仅能够改变一个女人的人生

translation.en: but the chance to change her entire family's future.
translation.zh: ‎也能够改变她所有家人的未来

translation.en: Across continents,
for generations to come.
And if we're being honest,
our lives are better when their lives are better.
translation.zh: ‎唯有下一代幸福了 我们才会幸福

translation.en: Or as my father would say,
translation.zh: ‎就像我父亲以前常说的一句话

translation.en: "A rising tide lifts all boats."
That's the real story here.
The question is, how many stories are we willing to rewrite?
translation.zh:
‎问题是 我们愿意再创造
‎多少个类似的故事？

translation.en: Hey.
Hey yourself.
Thank you.
How can you afford to buy so many of these?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么有钱买这么多杯咖啡？

translation.en: I'm hopelessly addicted to caffeine and prefer not to drink alone.
translation.zh:
‎我对咖啡已经无可救药地上瘾
‎所以我不想一个人喝

translation.en: Enjoy it while you can.
translation.zh: ‎趁还有机会 好好享受吧

translation.en: Wait, what?
Unfortunately, I won't be able to keep you here.
translation.zh: ‎很遗憾地告诉你 我留不下你了

translation.en: James, I thought we--
You convinced them to invest an additional ten million beyond our ask.
translation.zh:
‎你说服了客户在原有的资金额上
‎加码了一千万美元

translation.en: What?
Oh my God!
And you're firing me?
Hardly. When I told London the good news,
translation.zh:
‎怎么可能？
‎我把这个好消息告诉伦敦的高层后

translation.en: they decided to offer the Southeast Asia division to you.
translation.zh:
‎他们决定
‎将东南亚分行总经理的位置交给你

translation.en: But that's your promotion.
[scoffs] London can wait. And let's be honest, I couldn't do half the job you will.
translation.zh:
‎伦敦可以等
‎老实说 我也没有你一半的实力

translation.en: No, no, no. I can't accept that.
translation.zh: ‎不对 不行 我不能接受

translation.en: You don't have a choice.
Now, not only did Singapore come through,
translation.zh: ‎如今不仅新加坡贷款项目定案了

translation.en: but we received an additional massive donation from Red Star
translation.zh:
‎我们还收到了
‎红星拉萨基金会的大笔捐款

translation.en: that really got London's attention.
translation.zh: ‎引起了伦敦高层的高度关注

translation.en: All because of you.
-Red Star? -Another charitable trust.
translation.zh:
‎-红星拉萨基金会？
‎-另一个慈善基金会

translation.en: Ash, when it rains it pours, and our little tin cup runneth over. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎艾莎 这叫低开高走 福杯满溢

translation.en: It's beautiful, isn't it?
Yes. It is.
Congratulations, Ash.
Now I have to go figure out how to spend all this money. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎现在我要去想想
‎该怎么使用这一大笔钱了

translation.en: James.
Thank you.
It was just coffee.
Priya! Tea's ready. And your phone is dinging.
translation.zh: ‎普莉雅 茶泡好了 你的手机响了

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God!
Okay. Okay. Okay. Okay.
What else could, "I have big news to share," mean, hey?
translation.zh:
‎她写道“有大好消息要告诉你”
‎还会有什么事呢？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, yeah. Yeah.
Yeah. Okay, okay. Listen, listen.
Why don't you come for Sunday lunch, hmm?
translation.zh:
‎不如星期天到我们家
‎一起吃顿午饭吧？

translation.en: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah. Absolutely.
Yeah, do wear a sari.
Okay. And I've already arranged mithai.
translation.zh: ‎好的 糕点我都打点好了

translation.en: Okay, okay. All right. Bye-bye.
Oh, yeah. Thank you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: ‎好的 谢谢你 感激不尽

translation.en: What's the occasion?
Just the Shahs coming for lunch.
translation.zh: ‎没什么 只是萨家要到我家来吃午饭

translation.en: Accha! Things getting serious, huh?
translation.zh: ‎看来他们是认真的 对吧？

translation.en: Hmm, yeah.
A word to the wise.
Don't blindly trust what Ravi's parents say about him.
translation.zh:
‎别盲目地相信
‎拉维的父母对他们儿子的评价

translation.en: Fine, theek hai.
Arre, listen.
Just do a background check. You know, college, job, horoscope--
translation.zh:
‎我劝你还是做个背景调查吧
‎大学、工作、生辰八字什么的

translation.en: Ravi graduated from MIT, for God's sake.
translation.zh:
‎拉维毕业于麻省理工学院
‎你有完没完？

translation.en: -Suneeta, listen. -And he makes my Asha happy.
translation.zh:
‎-苏妮塔 你听我说
‎-最重要的是 他能给我家艾莎幸福

translation.en: Here we go.
Everybody, come. Line up. We'll do the photo.
translation.zh: ‎大家都过来 排排站 拍张合影

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Coming. Coming!
-[Suneeta] Come here. -[Vijay] Come on.
[Dinesh] Come, Veena. Okay.
-One, two, three. Say paneer. -[camera beeping]
[all] Paneer!
I can't wait to see their faces!
translation.zh: ‎我等不及看到他们的表情了

translation.en: -Oh, I hear the door. -Okay.
[Suneeta] Shh, shh.
…getting a pet.
[All] Surpri…
Oh, it's you guys.
Namaste. What's the occasion? What are we celebrating?
translation.zh:
‎鞠躬 今天是什么大日子？
‎要庆祝什么？

translation.en: -I'm Nick. -We're waiting for…
-Oh, I see them coming! Stand over here. -Okay. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我看到他们走过来了 赶紧站好
‎-好的

translation.en: -[Nick] Wait, what's going on? -[both chuckle]
Oh my God.
[all] Surprise!
Look at their faces!
Mom? Dad?
I had no idea that Ravi's parents were joining us for lunch. Hello.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道拉维的父母
‎也会过来一起吃午饭 你们好

translation.en: Oh, your future in-laws don't need a formal invite.
translation.zh:
‎他们是你的未来公婆
‎没必要发出正式邀请

translation.en: Sorry, my what?
Your mom is a bit overexcited.
[Suneeta] For your news, huh?
translation.zh: ‎你有大好消息要宣布 对吧？

translation.en: We wanted to throw a party, but this will do for now.
translation.zh:
‎我们本来打算办一场聚会的
‎但目前这样就足够了

translation.en: Okay. So tell us your big news!
translation.zh: ‎好了 马上宣布你的大好消息吧

translation.en: Oh my God. No, Mom. That's not what this is.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 妈妈 你误会了

translation.en: You're not getting engaged?
What? No. Dad, why would you think that?
translation.zh:
‎什么？没打算
‎老爸 你怎么会这么想呢？

translation.en: You and Asha seem so happy, we thought--
translation.zh: ‎你和艾莎在一起这么开心 我们以为…

translation.en: And then maybe my mom got a crazy idea?
Suneeta, I told you not to let the bull hit you.
translation.zh:
‎苏妮塔 我都跟你说了
‎别与同一个地域的公牛为敌

translation.en: Boy, is that true, Mr. M.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 伯父 真有这句谚语吗？

translation.en: Always with the sayings, Vijay!
translation.zh: ‎维杰 老说同样的谚语不烦吗？

translation.en: Okay, then, so what is this big news?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那你的大好消息是什么？

translation.en: Singapore, Ma! I got the funding for the loan initiative.
translation.zh: ‎我争取到新加坡的贷款资金了！

translation.en: -Oh my God! Congrats! -Hey!
Thank you.
Is that a promotion?
Yes, actually. And a raise.
-[scoffs] -More travel?
You could say that. The position is in the company headquarters in London, so…
translation.zh:
‎可以这么说
‎这个职位是在伦敦总部 所以…

translation.en: London, London?
Oh no. London, England, babe.
translation.zh: ‎不是 亲爱的 是英国首都伦敦

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. I don't accept this. No.
When were you gonna tell me?
translation.zh: ‎你本来打算什么时候告诉我的？

translation.en: Uh, right now. That's literally what this is.
translation.zh:
‎就是现在
‎这就是我要告诉你的大好消息

translation.en: Wow, London. That's, um…
A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
Thanks, Dad.
But look. If you're going to go so far at least get engaged first.
translation.zh:
‎听好 既然你要去这么远的地方
‎起码先订婚吧

translation.en: -Mom! -[Dinesh] I agree.
I could check their horoscopes next week.
translation.zh: ‎我下星期就找人给你们看生辰八字

translation.en: No horoscope, none of this nonsense.
translation.zh:
‎别看生辰八字了
‎别信这些有的没的

translation.en: I agree. They care for each other. That's all that matters.
translation.zh: ‎我同意 最重要的是他们相亲相爱

translation.en: Yeah. And Ravi, we know you are a kind, decent, honest boy. Hmm?
translation.zh:
‎拉维 我们都知道
‎你是个善良诚实的好孩子 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, Auntie, it's nice that you say that, but I… I need to tell you something.
translation.zh:
‎伯母 很高兴听你这么说
‎有件事我一定要告诉你

translation.en: -Like, all of you. -[coughs]
Ravi. [chokes]
-Dad? -Dinesh?
-Are you okay? -Get some water.
Are you okay?
Ravi, don't say anything. It's your last chance to be happy!
translation.zh:
‎拉维 什么都别说
‎这是你最后一次获得幸福的机会

translation.en: -Try to relax. -Quickly, quickly!
I'm okay.
Guys, he's fine. He panicked.
translation.zh: ‎各位 他没事 他只是太激动了

translation.en: Relax, Dinesh. They'll get married in their own time.
translation.zh:
‎迪内什 别激动
‎他们会选在合适的时候结婚

translation.en: -Dad, stop it. -Whiskey.
translation.zh:
‎-老爸 别再说了
‎-我要威士忌

translation.en: Okay. Uncle, that's not the reason he panicked.
translation.zh: ‎伯父 这不是他激动的原因

translation.en: He panicked 'cause I was gonna tell you that my biodata, it's all lies.
translation.zh:
‎他激动是因为我刚才想跟你们说
‎我的个人资料都是假的

translation.en: But who cares? So is mine. Everyone's is.
translation.zh:
‎谁在乎呢？我的也是假的
‎每个人的资料都是假的

translation.en: Yeah, but Asha, mine is, like--
Yeah, but you did go to MIT. You do run your own company.
translation.zh:
‎你的确读过麻省理工学院
‎你确实自己开公司

translation.en: Okay, come on, Dad. Yeah, I went to MIT. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎够了 老爸 我确实读过麻省理工学院

translation.en: I was 16 years old. I didn't know what I was doing.
translation.zh: ‎当年我才16岁 不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: So I dropped out, by the way.
That must've been very difficult. When did you go back?
translation.zh:
‎你肯定很辛苦
‎那你什么时候回去接着读的？

translation.en: I didn't go back, Uncle.
I couldn't. I just…
I needed time to figure out what I wanted, without all the pressure.
translation.zh:
‎我需要时间想清楚自己想做什么
‎那段时间不能有任何压力

translation.en: And that time, it…
It saved my life.
So, yeah, I didn't finish college.
But I do have a company.
It's just not a start-up. I'm a DJ.
translation.zh: ‎但不是什么初创企业 我是个DJ

translation.en: -[Nick scoffs] -[in Hindi] Hai raam.
[Vijay in English] It's okay.
Why didn't you just tell me?
Asha, I tried to.
He should've come clean way sooner, but it's not a big deal.
translation.zh:
‎他应该早点跟你说清楚的
‎但也不算什么大事

translation.en: -When we found out, it-- -You and Nick knew about this?
translation.zh:
‎-我和尼克得知…
‎-你和尼克早就知道了？

translation.en: My buddy Joby told me, yeah.
You didn't think it was important to tell me?
Because we like him.
Right?
Oh yeah, no, we like him. Oh yeah, a lot.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我们都喜欢他 很喜欢他

translation.en: Wait a minute. Ravi, you had 15 years to make it right?
translation.zh:
‎等等 拉维
‎你明明有15年的时间调整人生方向

translation.en: Go back to school, get a job, but…
translation.zh: ‎回去上大学、找份工作 可是…

translation.en: [scoffs] You become a DJ?
Ravi, can this lifestyle support a family?
translation.zh: ‎拉维 这种生活能够养家糊口吗？

translation.en: Dad, don't ask him that. We're not getting engaged.
translation.zh:
‎老爸 别问他这种问题
‎我们又没打算订婚

translation.en: Yeah, Uncle, I can.
[Asha] And why are you even responding?
I don't need anyone to support me. Why is this always about supporting me?
translation.zh:
‎我不需要任何人养
‎为什么偏要找个人养我呢？

translation.en: Even if I wanted a family, I could do it on my own.
translation.zh:
‎就算我想组织家庭
‎凭我一己之力也做得到

translation.en: All I would really like is some honesty.
But Asha, wasn't it your idea to pretend to be a couple in the first place?
translation.zh: ‎艾莎 假扮情侣不是你出的主意吗？

translation.en: -[mothers] What? -Oh my God.
You lied to us, Asha?
How could you do this?
Because of this!
Because you people drive us insane with your pressure. This is what happens!
translation.zh:
‎因为你们向我们施压
‎把我们都搞疯了 这就是事实！

translation.en: We are dating now, though.
What's the point of that? You're a DJ. How will you pay for your kids' college?
translation.zh:
‎重要吗？你是个DJ
‎你付得起孩子的大学学费吗？

translation.en: -Mom… -Anyone smell the…
'Cause it smells like burning, so…
I told you! No one wants to marry a bum like you. Now do you see?
translation.zh:
‎都说没人想跟你这种废物结婚了
‎看到了吧？

translation.en: Don't call my son a bum!
You encouraged this!
Okay, Dad, stop.
Let me ask you. Who do you think paid for all the catering orders these last months?
translation.zh: ‎过去几个月以来 是谁跟你订餐的？

translation.en: -What? -Food banks, homeless shelters, the teams.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-食物银行、收容中心、棒球队

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Red Star Standard, Dad. Ring a bell?
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么呢？
‎-你对红星拉萨基金会有印象吗？

translation.en: [Dinesh] What about it?
Those are my initials, Dad. That's me, I'm Red Star Standard.
translation.zh:
‎我的名字都在上面了
‎我就是红星拉萨基金会的经营者

translation.en: Red Star Standard?
That's you?
Yeah. It's this charitable fund I just…
[whispers] Oh my God.
-Asha… -[smoke detector beeping]
[breathes heavily] No one panic. The aloo gobi's on fire.
translation.zh: ‎别紧张 香辣土豆花椰菜烧焦了

translation.en: [Suneeta] What? Aloo gobi?
translation.zh: ‎什么？香辣土豆花椰菜烧焦了？

translation.en: -Asha, wait. -[Suneeta] Oh my God! [Asha] Did it ever occur to you to ask?
translation.zh:
‎-艾莎 别跑
‎-你想过先问我吗？

translation.en: Why are you so upset?
Oh. [scoffs] How many more surprises do you have for me?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你还要给我多少惊喜？

translation.en: I thought this would make you happy.
"You have to own what you want and trust your inner voice?" What the hell?
translation.zh:
‎什么“接纳自己想要什么
‎倾听内心的声音”都是胡扯吧？

translation.en: I meant it.
But you don't think I can do my job on my own.
Asha, you convinced me it was a good investment--
translation.zh:
‎艾莎 是你说服了我相信
‎那是一项有意义的投资项目

translation.en: I wasn't trying to convince you. I needed to do this by myself.
translation.zh:
‎我没有要说服你的意思
‎我要靠自己做到

translation.en: I just wanted to help.
Help?
The way you helped your dad? Don't you see that it's so patronizing?
translation.zh:
‎就像你帮你爸一把那样吗？
‎你真以为自己高人一等吗？

translation.en: How do you even have so much money?
translation.zh:
‎你哪来的这么多钱？
‎你去抢劫银行吗？

translation.en: Rob a bank? Sell endangered species off the back of a van.
translation.zh:
‎你哪来的这么多钱？
‎你去抢劫银行吗？ ‎还是贩卖濒危物种？

translation.en: No, it's because of Facebook.
-So you did work at a start-up. -Not exactly.
translation.zh: ‎你确实曾在初创企业公司上班

translation.en: I DJ'd a couple parties for them back in the day and they couldn't pay.
translation.zh:
‎也不能这么说
‎我在他们好几场派对上演出过 ‎当年他们付不起我的酬劳
‎于是给了我股份

translation.en: Gave me stock instead.
translation.zh:
‎当年他们付不起我的酬劳
‎于是给了我股份

translation.en: You made a million bucks DJing some nerd parties?
translation.zh:
‎在某个宅男办的派对上打碟
‎就能赚进一百万？

translation.en: A lot more, actually. Look, it's no big deal.
translation.zh: ‎其实更多 你听我说 那不是什么大事

translation.en: It is a big deal. I am not some cause.
translation.zh: ‎是大事 我不是你的资助对象

translation.en: I know that, Asha. I know that.
At least Krish was honest about the fact that he didn't believe in me.
translation.zh:
‎起码克里什会当着我的面说
‎他不相信我有实力

translation.en: -You did it behind my back. -Seriously?
translation.zh:
‎-你则在悄悄瞧不起我
‎-你真的这么想吗？

translation.en: Let me ask. You ever been honest about a single relationship?
translation.zh:
‎艾莎 我问你
‎你有没有对你的感情诚实过？

translation.en: -Don't turn this around. -You wanted to role-play.
translation.zh:
‎-别反过来说我
‎-是你建议我们假扮情侣的

translation.en: Yeah, and you broke character.
There is a big difference between telling a white lie and being completely untruthful.
translation.zh:
‎说善意的谎言和口是心非
‎完全是两回事

translation.en: Who even are you?
Asha, I'm the guy who went to 14 weddings with you.
translation.zh:
‎艾莎 我是那个跟你一起去过
‎14场婚礼的男人

translation.en: Not because I had to. Not because my parents forced me to.
translation.zh:
‎我去不是因为义务
‎不是因为我父母逼我去

translation.en: I went because I genuinely wanted to.
That's the only thing I was untruthful about.
That I didn't have to pretend to be in love with you. Which is what I am, by the way.
translation.zh:
‎真相是我没必要假装跟你交往
‎因为我已经爱上你了

translation.en: I'm in love with you.
I opened my heart to you, Ravi.
Do you know what that took?
And for the record,
I don't care about MIT.
translation.zh:
‎我甚至不在乎
‎你是不是麻省理工学院的毕业生

translation.en: I trusted you, and you let me down.
Hey, Mom.
I can't believe it, beta. You spent thousands on orders through Red Star.
translation.zh:
‎你以红星拉萨基金会的名义
‎在我们餐厅里花了好几千块

translation.en: He wouldn't let me help you otherwise, so…
translation.zh: ‎那是因为老爸不肯接受我的资助

translation.en: You were always different, even as a child.
And I worried for you.
Mom, what was the point in lying?
Asha and her parents want nothing to do with me now.
translation.zh: ‎艾莎和他父母都跟我断绝来往了

translation.en: We were only trying to help.
Do not blame your mom. You met Asha because of that biodata.
translation.zh:
‎别怪你妈 你和艾莎
‎还不是因为那份个人资料认识的？

translation.en: Can't you see?
You're our son. We would lie, die, whatever for your happiness.
translation.zh:
‎你是我们的儿子 为了你的幸福
‎我们不惜撒谎 要我们死也无妨

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, but I was happy.
Then you should've kept your mouth shut.
Talk to her.
-She won't take my calls. -Then go to her.
translation.zh:
‎-她不接我的电话
‎-那就去找她啊

translation.en: [sighs] It doesn't matter.
I came to tell you I'm going back to work.
translation.zh: ‎我来是想跟你们说 我要回去工作了

translation.en: Yoshi lined up a bunch of gigs, and I just…
translation.zh: ‎阿良给我排了很多演出 所以…

translation.en: -I think it's time. -Ravi, no.
translation.zh:
‎-我该回去工作了
‎-拉维 别去

translation.en: Mom, I am done lying. I'm done pretending to be someone I'm not.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 我不想再骗人了
‎不想再伪装自己了

translation.en: Again, you're running away the minute things get hard. [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎事情不尽人意时 你就想逃避吗？

translation.en: Okay. Here's the thing, Dad.
I am not running away.
Okay? This is my job. This is who I am.
translation.zh: ‎好吗？这是我的工作 这就是我

translation.en: I just wish you could see that. I wish that was enough, but clearly not…
translation.zh:
‎我真希望你会了解我
‎我希望你觉得我够好了 可是你显然…

translation.en: Ravi, it's not that. We want you--
translation.zh: ‎拉维 你误会了 我们只是希望你…

translation.en: We want the son we lost when he dropped out of MIT and disappeared.
translation.zh:
‎我们希望当年那个
‎退学后失踪的儿子能够回到我们身边

translation.en: -We want those years back. -Yeah, but those years are gone, Dad!
translation.zh:
‎-我们想要找回那些年
‎-老爸 那些年都过去了！

translation.en: Those years are gone!
But the son you do have is standing right in front of you. I am right here.
translation.zh:
‎但你的儿子就站在你的眼前
‎我就在这里

translation.en: Okay.
I recommend a flat in Shoreditch.
translation.zh: ‎我推荐你一个位于肖迪奇的公寓单位

translation.en: It's murderously expensive, but you're getting a raise.
translation.zh: ‎房租超贵的 但你也快加薪了

translation.en: They called again to see if you'd signed.
translation.zh:
‎高层又打来了
‎他们想知道你签了没有

translation.en: Ash, he's an international DJ. You'll see him again.
translation.zh:
‎艾莎 他可是国际级DJ
‎你们还是会再见面的

translation.en: I don't think so.
Look. I'm sorry. I'm confused.
This guy that you pretended to date and thought was broke,
translation.zh: ‎你起初只是假装跟这个穷光蛋交往

translation.en: you actually fell in love with.
Okay. And, it turns out, oh, he's crazy rich.
Not to mention, he helped you get promoted over your boss.
translation.zh: ‎他还帮你比你的上司先一步升职了

translation.en: He believes in you.
And this is the guy you never wanna see again.
translation.zh: ‎结果你却决定跟他断绝来往

translation.en: You need to swallow your pride you need to sign that contract,
translation.zh: ‎麻烦你放下尊严 签下那份合同

translation.en: and then you need to apologize to that boy. It is that simple.
translation.zh: ‎然后去跟那个家伙道歉 就这么简单

translation.en: -It's not-- -I don't wanna hear it!
You know what's not simple?
Seeing you go.
I'm gonna miss you.
We're gonna miss you.
I'm gonna hate your phony British accent you're obviously gonna come home with.
translation.zh:
‎等你以后回来后
‎我一定会恨死你一口造作的英国腔

translation.en: But if you let opportunities like this pass you by…
translation.zh: ‎可是如果你错过这个大好机会

translation.en: -I'm gonna have to kill you. -[Asha chuckles]
I know people in this town who can make that happen.
-Okay. -If it's really over, why not just go? What's holding you back?
translation.zh:
‎既然你们都分手了 何必迟疑呢？
‎是什么让你踌躇不前？

translation.en: I guess my family, my parents, my sister. I've never left them like this before.
translation.zh:
‎可能是舍不得我的父母和妹妹吧
‎我从来没离开他们这么远

translation.en: We spend so much energy trying to get away from our parents.
translation.zh:
‎我们花了这么大的力气
‎摆脱父母的羁绊

translation.en: And when we finally get the chance…
translation.zh: ‎如今终于有机会摆脱他们了

translation.en: It was hard for me to leave Jamaica for London.
translation.zh:
‎当初离开牙买加去伦敦时
‎我也是很痛苦

translation.en: I didn't want to abandon my parents. In spite of our differences.
translation.zh:
‎我并不想抛下父母
‎即使我们之间的想法相差很大

translation.en: And how did you?
I realized my life is where I take it.
translation.zh:
‎我领悟到
‎我在哪里 我的人生就在哪里

translation.en: My parents will always be there for me.
translation.zh: ‎我的父母永远都不会离我而去

translation.en: But opportunities like these don't come along every day.
So this is where you're saving the world.
translation.zh: ‎原来这就是你拯救世界的地方

translation.en: -Dad? -[exhales] We were just leaving.
Mr. Maurya.
What are you doing here?
You want to go for a walk?
Beta, when I was a young economist, it was a different time.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 我还是个年轻的经济学家时
‎那是一个截然不同的年代

translation.en: White men half as smart as me would get promoted above me.
translation.zh:
‎只有白人男子有机会升职
‎即使他们的聪明只有我的一半

translation.en: I'd get stuck doing their job for them.
translation.zh: ‎我永远只有替他们干活的份

translation.en: You know what my boss said? He said, "Indians? They're smart, sure,
translation.zh:
‎你知道我的上司说什么吗？
‎他说：“印度人确实很聪明

translation.en: but they're numbers guys. They'll never be leaders."
translation.zh:
‎但他们只懂数字
‎永远不是当领导的料”

translation.en: I know. Makes me so mad. I'm sorry you had to go through that, Dad.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 我知道后也很生气
‎真替你感到难过

translation.en: Which is why I was so worried that you were being too idealistic.
translation.zh:
‎我当初担心你
‎是因为你想得太完美了

translation.en: I didn't want you to face the same disappointment I had.
But, um, look at you.
